name: BT Broadband Check
description: Checking broadband availability in BT portal, without login.

steps.prompt: Fill in the address form with these details: - Building Number field: 1 - Street/Road field: 'Church View' - PostCode field: 'DN12 1RH'. Then click the Submit button.
If an address list appears, select the closest match to 1 Church View, DN12 1RH.

Extract the broadband availability information from the results page.- Exchange name (e.g., "KINGSLAND GREEN") - Cabinet number (e.g., "Cabinet 9") - VDSL Range A downstream and upstream rates - Availability status
